description:
The most extroverted guy in Shuuji`s circle of friends and Yukari`s boyfriend. Take is the first one to get a girlfriend in Shuuji`s group (a fact Nori is very envious about). His girlfriend is named Yukari and they have been going out for two months by the start of the series. They constantly fight with each other (a fact only Chise seems to notice). He decides to buy a rose quartz at the Sapporo mall to try to get on her good side again.
He dies during the bombing, holding Yukari`s pendant in his hand. His classmates put flowers and a framed picture on his old desk as a tribute to him after his death. In the manga version, he survives the attack.
name: Take
